participant_1.background:
I work as a nurses aide in a nursing home.
I have three grown children and six grandchildren.
I love caring for people.
I have two dogs and one cat.

participant_2.background:
I have always wanted a big family.
I am a married mother of a kids.
My husband runs his own business.
When i have some spare time i read.

content.text: I work as a nurses aide in a nursing home. I love caring for people.
I am a married mother of two kids. I always wanted a big family. My husband runs his own business. I like reading in my spare time.
It sounds like you are a busy person.
I am, but I wouldn't have it any other way.
I'm glad to hear that. What do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of things, but I'm particularly interested in history and biographies.
I love history too! What's your favorite historical period?
I'm not sure if I have a favorite historical period, but I do love learning about the different cultures and civilizations that have existed throughout history.
Me too! I think it's so interesting to see how different people have lived and interacted with each other throughout history.
I agree. It's amazing to think about how much history has shaped the world we live in today.
It really is. I'm so glad I got the chance to talk to you. You're a very interesting person.
Thanks! I'm glad I got to talk to you too.
